ModMetaData.name: Automatic Bed Reassignment
ModMetaData.author: pointfeev
ModMetaData.description:
This mod automatically reassigns pawns' beds when: * pawns are sharing beds with non-partners * pawns are separated from their partners * pawns are suffering a mood penalty from a bedroom-specific trait (jealous, greedy, ascetic) * there are empty beds with better stats for the pawn (impressiveness, rest effectiveness, comfort, beauty)
It also adds two gizmos to beds; ... one that allows you to toggle whether a certain bed can be utilized by the mod ... and one that allows you to force a pawn to always claim and use a certain bed.
